data.content: 总在不停寻觅你的踪影，无论十字路口抑或梦境之中，明知你不在，却依然不停地找寻。
“你愿意做我的太阳吗？” “我愿意。” “那么请你与我保持92955886.7公里。” “……” ​​​

In the December sunshine, I turn to look at your side face. Your voice is like a song rippling in the breeze. You must all know，you must not care , just turn around and smile brightly...You must all know, you must not care, let me sigh silently...
